TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit UrlEncodedParameterWriter extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter
Public MustInherit Class UrlEncodedParameterWriter Inherits MimeParameterWriter

summary.span: 为使用 HTTP 实现但不支持 SOAP 的 Web 服务客户端提供传出请求参数编写器的 URL 编码功能。

span.span: Provides URL encoding functionality for writers of out-going request parameters for Web service clients implemented using HTTP but without SOAP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间中的其他类 通过 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 操作支持 Web 服务的 .NET Framework 实现。 and other classes in the namespace support the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations. Web 服务编写器和读取器分别在参数或返回 Web 方法的对象和 HTTP 请求或响应流之间进行序列化和反序列化。Web service writers and readers serialize and deserialize, respectively, between the parameters or return objects of Web methods and the HTTP request or response streams. Web 服务编写器和读取器使用 HTTP 进行传输，但不使用 SOAP 标准交换消息。Web service writers and readers use HTTP for transport but don't exchange messages using the SOAP standard. 抽象 类继承自抽象 类，将 Web 方法参数的客户端编写的 URL 编码功能添加到 HTTP 请求流中。The abstract class inherits from the abstract class, adding URL encoding functionality for client-side writing of Web method parameters into HTTP request streams. 通常不需要 直接使用或其子类。You typically will not need to use or its descendant classes directly. 相反，当 Wsdl.exe 工具根据 HTTP GET 或 HTTP POST 实现生成客户端代理代码时，它会将应用于 每个 Web 方法，并将该特性的 属性设置为相应的类型。Instead, when the Wsdl.exe tool generates client proxy code according to the HTTP-GET or HTTP-POST implementations, it applies the to each Web method and sets the attribute's property to the appropriate type. > [!NOTE] > 超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1 指定使用多用途 Internet 邮件扩展 (MIME) 消息格式，这种格式本身允许电子邮件指定不同的内容类型，包括文本和二进制。The Hypertext Transfer Protocol--HTTP/1.1 specifies the use of a variation on Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) message format, which itself allows email messages to specify different content types, both text and binary.

summary.span: 对 Web 方法的所有参数值进行编码，然后将它们写入指定编写器。

span.span: Encodes all the parameter values for a Web method and writes them to the specified writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的重载 为每个参数值（包括数组中的单个项）调用另一个重载。This overload of the method calls the other overload, , for each of the parameter values, including individual items in arrays.

summary.span: 对指定参数值进行编码，然后将它写入指定编写器。

span.span: Encodes a specified parameter value and writes it to the specified writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的另一个签名（为 每个 Web 方法调用）为每个 参数值（包括数组中的单个项）调用此方法的签名。The other signature of the method, , which is called for each Web method, calls this signature of the method for each of the parameter values, including individual items in arrays.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object GetInitializer (System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo methodInfo);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object GetInitializer(class System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo methodInfo) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetInitializer (methodInfo As LogicalMethodInfo) As Object
public: override System::Object ^ GetInitializer(System::Web::Services::Protocols::LogicalMethodInfo ^ methodInfo);
override this.GetInitializer : System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo -> obj

param.name: methodInfo
param.span: ，指定为其获取初始值设定项的 Web 方法。

span.span: A that specifies the Web method for which the initializer is obtained.

summary.span: 返回指定方法的初始值设定项。

span.span: Returns an initializer for the specified method.

returns.span: 包含指定方法的初始值设定项的 。

span.span: An that contains the initializer for the specified method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始值设定项是作为参数传递给方法的对象 。An initializer is an object passed as a parameter to the method. 对于 类，初始值设定项是 输入对象的属性的值 。For the class, the initializer is the value of the property of the input object. 属性为 数组。The property is a array. 方法在服务初始化过程中调用。The method is invoked during service initialization. 稍后，当填充请求时，初始值设定项对象将传递给 另一个实例的方法 。Later, at the time a request is populated, the initializer object is passed to the method of another instance. 其他对象执行实际的写入。The other object performs the actual writing.

override this.Initialize : obj -> unit

param.name: initializer
param.span: 通过 类的 属性获取的一个 数组。

span.span: A array obtained through the property of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当填充请求时，将调用方法。The method is invoked at the time a request is populated. `initializer`通过 在客户端初始化期间调用另一个实例上的方法来获取输入参数。The input parameter, `initializer`, is obtained by calling the method on another instance during client initialization.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于将参数写入到 HTTP 请求的编码。

span.span: Gets or sets the encoding used to write parameters to the HTTP request.

value.span: 用于将参数写入到 HTTP 请求的编码。

span.span: The encoding used to write parameters to the HTTP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由类表示的编码定义了 如何将字符转换为一个字节序列。An encoding, as represented by the class, defines how to transform characters into a sequence of bytes.
